title: Java web server with MySQL fabflix web application

content.content: This is a web application that sells movies online. Actually it is not only a web app, it contains a Android app as well. It contains a lot of different aspects and it is one of the projects that I am most satisfied with. I finished everything by myself: frontend (Web and android), backend (Java Tomcat Server), and Database (Mysql)

content.title: project tech stacks
content.content:
Tech Stacks:
Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Android(Dev tool in Intellij)
Backend: Java, Tomcat, AWS, MySQL, Maven

content.title: content
content: Developed web and Android apps for movie sales with frontend AJAX, Google reCAPTCHA API, autocomplete
Implemented <mark>24+</mark> backend APIs, includingsearch, sessions, password encryption features with Java Tomcat server
Designed and optimized a MySQL database, ensuring protection against SQL injection using prepared statements
Enhanced backend data with XML parser and performance through SQL query modification, JDBC pooling, MySQL Master-Slave Replication, stored procedures, and Load Balancer
Deployed the application with a more than 400,000 records database to AWS, GCP servers, achieving throughput of more than <mark>17,000</mark> requests per second as tested by JMeter.
